Question: EVBox North America Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
EVBox North America Inc.

Product: EVBox Troniq Modular

- DC fast charging station with power capacity of up to 240kW
- Can charge up to two cars simultaneously
- Smart charging features enable power distribution via Dynamic & Cluster Load Balancing
- Assembles the stations for North American customers at Libertyville, Illinois facility
- Buy America compliant with plans to start shipping in second half of 2023
